nodes.text: Hidden in a secret area behind a waterfall on Jagomir, an ancient Sith artifact has laid untouched for years. The Galactic Empire was searching for this artifact, hoping to use the Crystal's power for destruction.

When the Ardan resistance arrives on Jagomir, a patrol looking for supplies scans a waterfall to reveal a secret area. When the Rebels enter, they find an ancient sith artifact. Some rebels suggest they sell the sith crystal on the Black market for a multitude of Credits to help supply the Rebel Alliance. When the rebel patrol goes to pick up the crystal, they see a vision of Setenna Hase being tortured by the imperials.
